name.description: secondary key for selecting Link Objects which share the same relation type

templated.description: SHOULD be true when the Link Object's "href" property is a URI Template

type.description: used as a hint to indicate the media type expected when dereferencing the target resource

profile.description: URI that hints about the profile of the target resource

title.description: intended for labelling the link with a human-readable identifier

hreflang.description: intended for indicating the language of the target resource

deprecation.description: presence indicates that the link is to be deprecated
